title: Time Travel Tondekeman! (Time Quest)
synopsis: The series starts when Hayato, a soccer enthusiast, and his girlfriend Yumi, an aspiring musician, went to a visit to Dr. Leonard's lab. They accidentally activated the Tondekeman, a funny talking kettle who transported them many centuries in the past.
voices: ['Sakuma, Rei', 'Mita, Yuuko', 'Sakuma, Rei', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Nishihara, Kumiko', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Mitsuya, Yuuji', 'Sasaoka, Shigezou', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Takiguchi, Junpei']
